name: Sturdy Finance
description: Sturdy Finance is a decentralized protocol for lending and borrowing assets. Borrowers can employ leverage farming of white-listed protocols with like-kind assets (up to 10x) with minimal liquidation risk. The unique point of Sturdy is interest earned by lenders doesn't come directly from borrowers, but from borrowers' farming profits instead.
